Name: Bridge
Description: Main command center of a starship. One is required per ship.

Name: Crew Quarters
Description: Living space for ship crew. One is required for each 500kT of ship mass.

Name: Ion Engine
Description: Provides enough thrust for a 500kT ship to move at speed 1.

Name: Depleted Uranium Cannon
Description: Projectile weapon which fires dense metallic slugs.
